CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 26, 1950, pg. 12, reads: "'Hansel and Gretel' at IKS - As a grand finale to the summer playground program at Irene Kaufmann Settlement last Thursday, the play, 'Hansel and Gretel,' was produced by these talented youngsters at the Settlement. Neal Hughley played the part of Hansel; Gloria Allen, the part of his sister, Gretel, and the Old Witch was portrayed by Florence Byrd. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children enacting Hansel and Gretel play, including "Gretel" Gloria Allen, "witch" Florence Byrd, and "Hansel" Neal Hughley, at Irene Kaufmann Settlement
